App_Accept:
Thank you for being patient with us.
Our management team have decided to accept your application.
To close this channel please react below.
App_Deny:
Thank you for being patient with us but unfortuately our management team have decided to deny your application.
To close this channel please react below.
Apply_Welcome_Message: Thank you for creating your application. Select an option below to start the application progress.
App_Start:
Your application will now begin.
Answer all the questions with as much detail as possible and answer Truthfully. **Good Look!**
App_End:
:wave: Your application has successfully come to the end. We have send of your application to our management team.
Please wait here patiently whilst we read through your application.
